com.team08storyapp

Class ChoiceAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
      • com.team08storyapp.ChoiceAdapter

  • public class ChoiceAdapter
extends
    ChoiceAdapter is a customized ArrayAdapter, which will populate only selected information of a list of Choice objects into a listView by overriding the getView method.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChoiceAdapter(Activity activity, int textViewResourceId, java.util.ArrayList<Choice> infos)
      Constructor of a ChoiceAdapter requires an activity object, an int value of resourceView, and an ArrayList of Choice objects as well.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      View getView(int position, View convertView, ViewGroup parent)

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChoiceAdapter

        public ChoiceAdapter(Activity activity,
             int textViewResourceId,
             java.util.ArrayList<Choice> infos)
        Constructor of a ChoiceAdapter requires an activity object, an int value of resourceView, and an ArrayList of Choice objects as well.
        Parameters:
        activity - an activity object that provides LAYOUT_INFLATER_SERVICE
        textViewResourceId - the int value of the id of the view
        infos - a list of choice objects

    • Method Detail

      • getView

        public View getView(int position,
           View convertView,
           ViewGroup parent)
        Public method getView overrides the getView method from ArrayAdapter for custom purpose. It will populate only the text in a Choice object into the TextView in the passed convertedView.
        Parameters:
        position - the index of the selected photo in the adapter
        convertView - the view that is going to be converted to user's desire
        parent - a ViewGroup object
